title: Oregon To Test Switching To Mileage-Based Gas Tax
teaser: Oregon is preparing to launch a first-in-the-nation tax: Instead of paying a per-gallon gas tax, drivers would pay for every mile they drive. So far, it's a voluntary program. But as cars become more fuel efficient, the state could expand it, if it proves to be a successful way of offsetting stagnant gas tax revenues.
